main.p: Welcome to admission module, you can put here anything you want, here you have a cat ipsum
main.h1: I can haz run around the house at 4 in the morning
main.p: Pee on walls it smells like breakfast fall asleep on the washing machine cats are a queer kind of folk so mark territory groom yourself 4 hours - checked, have your beauty sleep 18 hours - checked, be fabulous for the rest of the day - checked. Walk on keyboard always hungry or sleeps on my head hey! you there, with the hands. Run in circles push your water glass on the floor, yet adventure always, lie in the sink all day pet right here, no not there, here, no fool, right here that other cat smells funny you should really give me all the treats because i smell the best and omg you finally got the right spot and i love you right now, dismember a mouse and then regurgitate parts of it on the family room floor nap all day. Immediately regret falling into bathtub play riveting piece on synthesizer keyboard, but then cats take over the world stand in front of the computer screen. Ask to go outside and ask to come inside and ask to go outside and ask to come inside i just saw other cats inside the house and nobody ask me before using my litter box for check cat door for ambush 10 times before coming in rub face on owner run as fast as i can into another room for no reason for i love cats i am one wake up scratch humans leg for food then purr then i have a and relax. Stares at human while pushing stuff off a table all of a sudden cat goes crazy hiiiiiiiiii feed me now and so you're just gonna scroll by without saying meowdy? and if it fits i sits swat turds around the house or mrow. Hunt anything that moves the fat cat sat on the mat bat away with paws so eat all the power cords eat too much then proceed to regurgitate all over living room carpet while humans eat dinner for murder hooman toes. Jump around on couch, meow constantly until given food, found somthing move i bite it tail bring your owner a dead bird, yet the fat cat sat on the mat bat away with paws. I like cats because they are fat and fluffy cough hairball, eat toilet paper demand to have some of whatever the human is cooking, then sniff the offering and walk away bird bird bird bird bird bird human why take bird out i could have eaten that. Ears back wide eyed hiss at vacuum cleaner.
